surface_layer.definition: A matrix switch that connects multiple inputs to multiple outputs.
common_uses: Connecting processors in a parallel computing system

deep_layer.mechanism: Allows any input to be connected to any output.
deep_layer.origin: High-speed data transfer in parallel computing

examples: A crossbar switch in a supercomputer
